## Simulation Function

This is a simulation function

```{r LPC simple}
  Simulate_bGLS<-function(N, nseq, alpha, st, sm)
  {
    As<-matrix(NA, nrow=N, ncol=nseq)
    for(o in 1:nseq)
    {
      M=rnorm(N+2)
      T=rnorm(N+2)
      
      Z=st*T[1:(N+1)]-sm*M[2:(N+2)]+sm*M[1:(N+1)]
      AA=rep(0,N+2)
      for(I in 1:(N+1))
      {
        AA[I+1]<-(1-alpha)*AA[I]+Z[I]
      }
      As[,o]<-AA[3:(N+2)]
    }
    As
  }
```
